item.title: 🐹 Yeeb1/SockTail (186 ⭐)
item.description:
👤 Owner: Yeeb1

📝 Repository: Yeeb1/SockTail

📄 Descrizione: Lightweight binary that joins a device to a Tailscale network and exposes a local SOCKS5 proxy. Designed for red team operations and ephemeral access into restricted environments using Tailscale’s embedded client (tsnet). Zero config, no daemon, no persistence - just a fast way in.

⭐ Stelle: 186

🍴 Forks: 18

💻 Linguaggio: Go

📜 Licenza: No license
